```tsx
// Enhanced scroll animation hook with more options
const useScrollAnimation = (threshold = 0.1, rootMargin = '50px') => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  const [hasAnimated, setHasAnimated] = useState(false);
  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting && !hasAnimated) {
            setIsVisible(true);
            setHasAnimated(true);
          }
        });
      },
      { threshold, rootMargin }
    );

    if (ref.current) {
      observer.observe(ref.current);
    }

    return () => {
      observer.disconnect();
    };
  }, [threshold, rootMargin, hasAnimated]);

  return [ref, isVisible] as const;
};

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  try {
    const config = getDataConfig();
    const posts = config.blogs?.slugs
      ?.map((slug) =>
        getPostBySlug({ slug }, ['slug', 'title', 'description', 'date', 'image'])
      )
      .filter((p) => p !== null) || [];
    return {
      props: {
        config,
        blogs: posts,
      },
    };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error loading homepage data:', error);
    return {
      props: {
        config: getDataConfig(),
        blogs: [],
      },
    };
  }
};

export default Home;
```

Äá»ƒ sá»­a lá»—i "Multiple children were passed to <Link>", báº¡n cáº§n Ä‘áº£m báº£o ráº±ng má»—i component `<Link>` chá»‰ cÃ³ má»™t child element duy nháº¥t. Lá»—i nÃ y xáº£y ra vÃ¬ trong code hiá»‡n táº¡i, má»™t sá»‘ `<Link>` cÃ³ nhiá»u child (vÃ­ dá»¥: má»™t `<span>` vÃ  má»™t `<div>` bÃªn trong).

TÃ´i sáº½ sá»­a báº±ng cÃ¡ch bá»c ná»™i dung bÃªn trong `<Link>` vÃ o má»™t element wrapper duy nháº¥t (vÃ­ dá»¥: `<div>` hoáº·c `<span>`). DÆ°á»›i Ä‘Ã¢y lÃ  phiÃªn báº£n Ä‘Ã£ sá»­a cá»§a file `index.tsx`:

```tsx
// Enhanced scroll animation hook with more options
const useScrollAnimation = (threshold = 0.1, rootMargin = '50px') => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  const [hasAnimated, setHasAnimated] = useState(false);
  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting && !hasAnimated) {
            setIsVisible(true);
            setHasAnimated(true);
          }
        });
      },
      { threshold, rootMargin }
    );

    if (ref.current) {
      observer.observe(ref.current);
    }

    return () => {
      observer.disconnect();
    };
  }, [threshold, rootMargin, hasAnimated]);

  return [ref, isVisible] as const;
};

interface IhomeProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
  blogs: PostItems[];
}

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  try {
    const config = getDataConfig();
    const posts =
      config.blogs?.slugs
        ?.map((slug) =>
          getPostBySlug({ slug }, [
            'slug',
            'title',
            'description',
            'date',
            'image',
          ])
        )
        .filter((p) => p !== null) || [];
    return {
      props: {
        config,
        blogs: posts,
      },
    };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error loading homepage data:', error);
    return {
      props: {
        config: getDataConfig(),
        blogs: [],
      },
    };
  }
};

export default Home;
```

// Custom hook for scroll animations
const useScrollAnimation = () => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            setIsVisible(true);
          }
        });
      },
      { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '50px' }
    );

    if (ref.current) {
      observer.observe(ref.current);
    }

    return () => {
      observer.disconnect();
    };
  }, []);

  return [ref, isVisible] as const;
};

interface IhomeProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
  blogs: PostItems[];
}

  const [differentiationRef, differentiationVisible] = useScrollAnimation();
  const [benefitsRef, benefitsVisible] = useScrollAnimation();

                  <div className="flex items-center text-sm text-gray-700">
                    <span className="w-2 h-2 bg-blue-500 rounded-full mr-2"></span>
                    <span>{course.level}</span>
                  </div>
                  <div className="flex items-center text-sm text-gray-700">
                    <span className="w-2 h-2 bg-purple-500 rounded-full mr-2"></span>
                    <span>{course.format}</span>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Success Stories Carousel */}
      <div
        ref={successStoriesRef}
        className={`py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-green-50 to-blue-50 transition-all duration-1000 ${
          successStoriesVisible
            ? 'animate-fade-in-up'
            : 'opacity-0 translate-y-12'
        }`}
      >
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
          <h2
            className={`text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center text-gray-900 mb-16 ${
              successStoriesVisible ? 'animate-scale-in' : 'opacity-0'
            }`}
          >
            CÃ¢u chuyá»‡n thÃ nh cÃ´ng
          </h2>

          <div className="relative">
            <div
              className={`bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-xl p-8 md:p-12 mx-auto max-w-4xl ${
                successStoriesVisible ? 'animate-scale-in' : 'opacity-0'
              }`}
              style={{ animationDelay: '0.2s' }}
            >
              <div className="text-center">
                <div className="w-20 h-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-500 to-purple-500 rounded-full mx-auto mb-6 flex items-center justify-center">
                  <img
                    src={successStories[currentStoryIndex].avatar}
                    alt={successStories[currentStoryIndex].name}
                    className="w-16 h-16 rounded-full object-cover"
                  />
                </div>
                <blockquote className="text-lg md:text-xl text-gray-700 italic mb-6 leading-relaxed">
                  "{successStories[currentStoryIndex].story}"
                </blockquote>
                <div className="space-y-2">
                  <h4 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">
                    {successStories[currentStoryIndex].name}
                  </h4>
                  <p className="text-gray-600">
                    {successStories[currentStoryIndex].achievement}
                  </p>
                  <p className="text-blue-600 font-medium">
                    {successStories[currentStoryIndex].course}

                  key={index}
                  className={`w-3 h-3 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 ${
                    index === currentStoryIndex ? 'bg-blue-600' : 'bg-gray-300'
                  }`}
                  onClick={() => setCurrentStoryIndex(index)}
                />
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* FAQ Section */}
      <div
        ref={faqRef}
        className={`py-20 bg-white transition-all duration-1000 ${
          faqVisible ? 'animate-fade-in-up' : 'opacity-0 translate-y-12'
        }`}
      >
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
          <h2
            className={`text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center text-gray-900 mb-16 ${
              faqVisible ? 'animate-scale-in' : 'opacity-0'
            }`}
          >
            CÃ¢u há»i thÆ°á»ng gáº·p
          </h2>

            {faqs.map((faq, index) => (
              <div
                key={index}
                className={`bg-gray-50 rounded-xl overflow-hidden card-hover ${
                  faqVisible ? 'animate-fade-in-up' : 'opacity-0'
                }`}
                style={{ animationDelay: `${index * 0.1}s` }}
              >
                <button
                  className="w-full text-left p-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:bg-gray-100"
                  onClick={() => setOpenFaq(openFaq === index ? null : index)}
                >
                  <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
                    <span className="text-lg">{faq.question}</span>
                    <span
                      className={`transform transition-transform duration-300 ${
                        openFaq === index ? 'rotate-180' : ''
                      }`}
                    >
                      â–¼
                    </span>
                  </div>
                </button>
                {openFaq === index && (
                  <div className="px-6 pb-6">
                    <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                      {faq.answer}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Call to Action */}
      <div className="py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-600 to-purple-700">
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 text-center">
          <h2 className="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-white mb-6">
            Sáºµn sÃ ng báº¯t Ä‘áº§u hÃ nh trÃ¬nh thÃ nh cÃ´ng?
          </h2>
          <p className="text-xl text-blue-100 mb-12">

            nghiá»‡p
          </p>

              href="#individual-form"
              className="bg-white text-blue-600 px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transform hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300"
            >

      </div>
    </Main>
  );
};

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  const posts = config.blogs.slugs
    .map((slug) =>
      getPostBySlug({ slug }, ['slug', 'title', 'description', 'date', 'image'])
    )
    .filter((p) => p !== null);
  return {
    props: {
      config,
      blogs: posts,
    },
  };
};

export default Home;

````tsx
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react';
import { GetServerSideProps } from 'next';
import Link from 'next/link';

import Booking from '../layout/Booking';
import { Meta } from '../layout/Meta';

  IAppConfig,
  PostItems,
  getDataConfig,
  getPostBySlug,
} from '../utils/Content';

// Custom hook for scroll animations
const useScrollAnimation = () => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            setIsVisible(true);
          }
        });
      },
      { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '50px' }
    );

    if (ref.current) {
      observer.observe(ref.current);
    }

    return () => {
      observer.disconnect();
    };
  }, []);

  return [ref, isVisible] as const;
};

interface IhomeProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
  blogs: PostItems[];
}

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  const posts = config.blogs.slugs
    .map((slug) =>
      getPostBySlug({ slug }, ['slug', 'title', 'description', 'date', 'image'])
    )
    .filter((p) => p !== null);
  return {
    props: {
      config,
      blogs: posts,
    },
  };
};
````

Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ thÃªm logo Ä‘á»‘i tÃ¡c, blog, hoáº·c tinh chá»‰nh thÃªm theo nháº­n diá»‡n thÆ°Æ¡ng hiá»‡u.

lÃ m láº¡i pháº§n nÃ y Ä‘áº¹p vÃ  hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i cÃ¢n Ä‘á»‘i import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react';

import Link from 'next/link';

import { IAppConfig } from '../utils/Content';

// Äá»‹nh nghÄ©a láº¡i interface (giá»¯ nguyÃªn)
interface INavbarProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
}

interface ILink {
  name: string;
  url: string;
}

// HÃ m trá»£ giÃºp: Biá»ƒu tÆ°á»£ng MÅ©i tÃªn (Chevron Down Icon) hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i hÆ¡n
const ChevronDownIcon = ({ visible }: { visible: boolean }) => (
  <svg
    className={`ml-1 w-3 h-3 transition-transform duration-300 ${
      visible ? 'transform rotate-180' : ''
    }`}
    fill="none"
    stroke="currentColor"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  >
    <path
      strokeLinecap="round"
      strokeLinejoin="round"
      strokeWidth="2"
      d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"
    />
  </svg>
);

// Component Dropdown Hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i hÆ¡n
function GroupPageLink({ name, urls }: { name: string; urls: Array<ILink> }) {
  const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false);

  // ThÃªm Ä‘á»™ trá»… Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh hiá»‡n/áº©n giáº­t cá»¥c khi di chuá»™t
  const enterTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
  const leaveTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);

  const handleMouseEnter = () => {
    if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    enterTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(true), 100); // 100ms delay
  };

  const handleMouseLeave = () => {
    if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
    leaveTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(false), 200); // 200ms delay
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    return () => {
      if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
      if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    };
  }, []);

  return (
    <div
      className="relative flex flex-col items-center" // ThÃªm 'relative' cho dropdown
      onMouseEnter={handleMouseEnter}
      onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave}
    >
      {/* NÃºt chÃ­nh */}
      <div className="py-2 px-3 flex items-center cursor-pointer select-none text-base font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-600 transition duration-300">
        <p className="inline">{name}</p>
        <ChevronDownIcon visible={visible} />
      </div>

      {/* Dropdown Menu - Thiáº¿t káº¿ dáº¡ng card hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i */}
      <ul
        className={`absolute top-full mt-1.5 w-max min-w-[180px] bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl py-2 transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out origin-top ${
          visible
            ? 'opacity-100 scale-y-100 visible'
            : 'opacity-0 scale-y-95 invisible'
        } border border-gray-100`}
      >
        {urls.map((u) => (
          <li key={u.name} className="text-left">
            <Link href={u.url} passHref>
              <a className="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-blue-600 transition duration-200 no-underline">
                {u.name}
              </a>
            </Link>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
}

// Component Navbar Tá»‘i Æ°u hÃ³a
const Navbar = (props: INavbarProps) => {
  const navbarRef = useRef<HTMLHeadElement>(null);

  // Xá»­ lÃ½ hiá»‡u á»©ng thu nhá» khi cuá»™n
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (navbarRef.current === null) return;
      const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;
      const isScrolled = window.scrollY > 50;

      if (!isMobile) {
        if (isScrolled) {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-2', 'shadow-md');
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-4', 'shadow-xl');
        } else {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-4', 'shadow-xl');
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2', 'shadow-md');
        }
      }
      // Giá»¯ padding cá»‘ Ä‘á»‹nh cho mobile
      else {
        navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-4', 'shadow-lg');
        navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2');
      }
    };

    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
    handleScroll(); // Cháº¡y láº§n Ä‘áº§u Ä‘á»ƒ set tráº¡ng thÃ¡i ban Ä‘áº§u

    return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
  }, []);

  // State cho Mobile Menu
  const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false);

  return (
    <header
      ref={navbarRef}
      className="text-gray-800 fixed top-0 w-full z-40 transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out bg-white shadow-xl py-4" // Hiá»‡u á»©ng mÆ°á»£t mÃ  hÆ¡n
    >
      <div className="container mx-auto px-4 md:flex md:items-center md:justify-between">
        {/* Logo */}
        <div className="flex items-center justify-between h-12 shrink-0">
          <Link href="/" passHref>
            <a aria-label="Home">
              <img
                src="/Logo TN7EDU.png"
                className="h-10 md:h-9 object-contain filter drop-shadow-sm"
                alt="TN7 Solutions Logo"
              />
            </a>
          </Link>

          {/* Mobile Menu Button */}
          <button
            className="md:hidden text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 focus:outline-none focus:text-gray-700"
            onClick={() => setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen)}
            aria-label="Toggle Menu"
          >
            <svg
              className="w-6 h-6"
              fill="none"
              stroke="currentColor"
              viewBox="0 0 24 24"
              xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
            >
              <path
                strokeLinecap="round"
                strokeLinejoin="round"
                strokeWidth="2"
                d={
                  isMenuOpen ? 'M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12' : 'M4 6h16M4 12h16m-7 6h7'
                }
              />
            </svg>
          </button>
        </div>

        {/* Menu (Desktop & Mobile) */}
        <nav
          className={`${
            isMenuOpen ? 'block' : 'hidden'
          } md:flex md:items-center md:space-x-4 mt-4 md:mt-0 w-full md:w-auto bg-white md:bg-transparent shadow-lg md:shadow-none absolute md:static top-full left-0 right-0 border-t md:border-t-0 border-gray-100 z-30`}
        >
          <ul className="flex flex-col md:flex-row list-none p-4 md:p-0">
            {/* Trang chá»§ */}
            <li className="md:inline-block">
              <Link href="/" passHref>
                <a className="block py-2 px-3 text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-600 font-medium transition duration-200 text-base">
                  Trang chá»§
                </a>
              </Link>
            </li>

            {/* Giá»›i thiá»‡u (Dropdown) */}
            <li className="md:inline-block">
              <GroupPageLink

````tsx
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { IAppConfig } from '../utils/Content';

interface INavbarProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
}
interface ILink {
  name: string;
  url: string;
}

const ChevronDownIcon = ({ visible }: { visible: boolean }) => (
  <svg
    className={`ml-1 w-4 h-4 transition-transform duration-300 ${visible ? 'rotate-180' : ''}`}
    fill="none"
    stroke="currentColor"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
  >
    <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7" />
  </svg>
);

function GroupPageLink({ name, urls }: { name: string; urls: Array<ILink> }) {
  const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false);
  const enterTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
  const leaveTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);

  const handleMouseEnter = () => {
    if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    enterTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(true), 80);
  };
  const handleMouseLeave = () => {
    if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
    leaveTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(false), 150);
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    return () => {
      if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
      if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    };
  }, []);

  return (
    <div className="relative flex flex-col items-center" onMouseEnter={handleMouseEnter} onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave}>
      <div className="py-2 px-3 flex items-center cursor-pointer select-none text-base font-semibold text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 transition duration-200">
        <span>{name}</span>
        <ChevronDownIcon visible={visible} />
      </div>
      <ul
        className={`absolute top-full left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 mt-2 min-w-[200px] bg-white rounded-xl shadow-2xl py-2 transition-all duration-300 origin-top border border-gray-100 ${
          visible ? 'opacity-100 scale-y-100 visible z-50' : 'opacity-0 scale-y-95 invisible'
        }`}
      >
        {urls.map((u) => (
          <li key={u.name}>
            <Link href={u.url} passHref>
              <a className="block px-5 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-blue-50 hover:text-blue-700 rounded-lg transition duration-200">
                {u.name}
              </a>
            </Link>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
}

const Navbar = (props: INavbarProps) => {
  const navbarRef = useRef<HTMLHeadElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (!navbarRef.current) return;
      const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;
      const isScrolled = window.scrollY > 40;
      if (!isMobile) {
        if (isScrolled) {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-2', 'shadow-md', 'bg-white/90', 'backdrop-blur');
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-5', 'shadow-xl');
        } else {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-5', 'shadow-xl');
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2', 'shadow-md', 'bg-white/90', 'backdrop-blur');
        }
      } else {
        navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-4', 'shadow-lg');
        navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2');
      }
    };
    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
    handleScroll();
    return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
  }, []);

  const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false);

  return (
    <header
      ref={navbarRef}
      className="fixed top-0 w-full z-50 transition-all duration-300 bg-white shadow-xl py-5"
      style={{ fontFamily: 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif' }}
    >
      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 flex items-center justify-between">
        {/* Logo */}
        <Link href="/" passHref>
          <a aria-label="Home" className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <img
              src="/Logo TN7EDU.png"
              className="h-10 w-auto object-contain drop-shadow-md"
              alt="TN7 Solutions Logo"
            />
            <span className="hidden md:inline text-xl font-bold text-gradient bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent tracking-tight">
              TN7 EDU
            </span>
          </a>
        </Link>

        {/* Mobile Menu Button */}
        <button
          className="md:hidden text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-700 focus:outline-none"
          onClick={() => setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen)}
          aria-label="Toggle Menu"
        >
          <svg className="w-7 h-7" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
            <path
              strokeLinecap="round"
              strokeLinejoin="round"
              strokeWidth="2"
              d={isMenuOpen ? 'M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12' : 'M4 6h16M4 12h16m-7 6h7'}
            />
          </svg>
        </button>

        {/* Menu */}
        <nav
          className={`${
            isMenuOpen ? 'block' : 'hidden'
          } md:flex md:items-center md:space-x-2 absolute md:static top-full left-0 right-0 bg-white md:bg-transparent shadow-lg md:shadow-none border-t md:border-t-0 border-gray-100 md:border-none mt-2 md:mt-0 px-4 md:px-0 py-4 md:py-0`}
        >
          <ul className="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-2 md:gap-0 list-none">
            <li>
              <Link href="/" passHref>
                <a className="block py-2 px-4 text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 font-semibold transition duration-200 rounded-lg">
                  Trang chá»§
                </a>
              </Link>
            </li>
            <li>
              <GroupPageLink
                name="Giá»›i thiá»‡u"
                urls={[
                  { name: 'Vá» chÃºng tÃ´i', url: '/about-us' },
                  { name: 'GiÃ¡o viÃªn', url: '/pages2/giaovien' },
                  { name: 'Cáº£m nháº­n khÃ¡ch hÃ ng', url: '/pages/camnhan' },
                  { name: 'CÃ¢u há»i thÆ°á»ng gáº·p', url: '/pages2/cauhoi' },
                ]}
              />
            </li>
            {[
              { name: 'KhÃ³a há»c', url: '/khoa-hoc' },
              { name: 'Há»c phÃ­ & Æ¯u Ä‘Ã£i', url: '/uu-dai' },
              { name: 'BÃ i viáº¿t', url: '/bai-viet' },
              { name: 'LiÃªn há»‡', url: '/hop-tac' },
            ].map((item) => (
              <li key={item.name}>
               Link href={item.url} passHref>
                  <a className="block py-2 px-4 text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 font-semibold transition duration-200 rounded-lg">
                    {item.name}
                  </a>
                </Link>
              </li>
            ))}

              </svg>
              <span>Gá»i tÆ° váº¥n</span>
````

````tsx
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { IAppConfig } from '../utils/Content';

interface INavbarProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
}
interface ILink {
  name: string;
  url: string;
}

const ChevronDownIcon = ({ visible }: { visible: boolean }) => (
  <svg
    className={`ml-1 w-4 h-4 transition-transform duration-300 ${visible ? 'rotate-180' : ''}`}
    fill="none"
    stroke="currentColor"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
  >
    <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7" />
  </svg>
);

function GroupPageLink({ name, urls }: { name: string; urls: Array<ILink> }) {
  const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false);
  const enterTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
  const leaveTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);

  const handleMouseEnter = () => {
    if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    enterTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(true), 80);
  };
  const handleMouseLeave = () => {
    if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
    leaveTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(false), 150);
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    return () => {
      if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
      if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    };
  }, []);

  return (
    <div
      className="relative flex flex-col items-center"
      onMouseEnter={handleMouseEnter}
      onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave}
    >
      <div className="py-2 px-3 flex items-center cursor-pointer select-none text-base font-semibold text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 transition duration-200">
        <span>{name}</span>
        <ChevronDownIcon visible={visible} />
      </div>
      <ul
        className={`absolute top-full left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 mt-2 min-w-[200px] bg-white rounded-xl shadow-2xl py-2 transition-all duration-300 origin-top border border-gray-100 ${

            ? 'opacity-100 scale-y-100 visible z-50'
            : 'opacity-0 scale-y-95 invisible'
        }`}
      >

          <li key={u.name            <Link href={u.url} passHref>

                {u.name}
              </a>
            </Link>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
}

const Navbar = (props: INavbarProps) => {
  const navbarRef = useRef<HTMLHeadElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (!navbarRef.current) return;

          navbarRef.current.classList.add(
            'py-2',
            'shadow-md',
            'bg-white/70',

          );

        } else {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-5', 'shadow-xl', 'bg-white/70', 'backdrop-blur-lg');
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove(
            'py-2',
            'shadow-md'
          );
        }
      } else {
        navbarRef.current.classList.add('py-4', 'shadow-lg', 'bg-white/70', 'backdrop-blur-lg');
        navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2', 'bg-white');
      }
````

full code import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react';

import Link from 'next/link';

import { IAppConfig } from '../utils/Content';

interface INavbarProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
}
interface ILink {
  name: string;
  url: string;
}

const ChevronDownIcon = ({ visible }: { visible: boolean }) => (
  <svg
    className={`ml-1 w-4 h-4 transition-transform duration-300 ${
      visible ? 'rotate-180' : ''
    }`}
    fill="none"
    stroke="currentColor"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
  >
    <path
      strokeLinecap="round"
      strokeLinejoin="round"
      strokeWidth="2"
      d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"
    />
  </svg>
);

function GroupPageLink({ name, urls }: { name: string; urls: Array<ILink> }) {
  const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false);
  const enterTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
  const leaveTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);

  const handleMouseEnter = () => {
    if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    enterTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(true), 80);
  };
  const handleMouseLeave = () => {
    if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
    leaveTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(false), 150);
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    return () => {
      if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
      if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    };
  }, []);

  return (
    <div
      className="relative flex flex-col items-center"
      onMouseEnter={handleMouseEnter}
      onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave}
    >
      <div className="py-2 px-3 flex items-center cursor-pointer select-none text-base font-semibold text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 transition duration-200">
        <span>{name}</span>
        <ChevronDownIcon visible={visible} />
      </div>
      <ul
        className={`absolute top-full left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 mt-2 min-w-[200px] bg-white rounded-xl shadow-2xl py-2 transition-all duration-300 origin-top border border-gray-100 ${
          visible
            ? 'opacity-100 scale-y-100 visible z-50'
            : 'opacity-0 scale-y-95 invisible'
        }`}
      >
        {urls.map((u) => (
          <li key={u.name}>
            <Link href={u.url} passHref>
              <a className="block px-5 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-blue-50 hover:text-blue-700 rounded-lg transition duration-200">
                {u.name}
              </a>
            </Link>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
}

const Navbar = (props: INavbarProps) => {
  const navbarRef = useRef<HTMLHeadElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (!navbarRef.current) return;
      const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;
      const isScrolled = window.scrollY > 40;
      if (!isMobile) {
        if (isScrolled) {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add(
            'py-2',
            'shadow-md',
            'bg-white/70',
            'backdrop-blur-lg'
          );
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-5', 'shadow-xl', 'bg-white');
        } else {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add(
            'py-5',
            'shadow-xl',
            'bg-white/70',
            'backdrop-blur-lg'
          );
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2', 'shadow-md');
        }
      } else {
        navbarRef.current.classList.add(
          'py-4',
          'shadow-lg',
          'bg-white/70',
          'backdrop-blur-lg'
        );
        navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2', 'bg-white');
      }
    };
    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
    handleScroll();
    return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
  }, []);

  const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false);

  return (
    <header
      ref={navbarRef}
      className="fixed top-0 w-full z-50 transition-all duration-300 bg-white/40 backdrop-blur-lg shadow-xl py-5"
      style={{ fontFamily: 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif' }}
    >
      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 flex items-center justify-between">
        {/* Logo */}
        <Link href="/" passHref>
          <a aria-label="Home" className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <img
              src="/Logo TN7EDU.png"
              className="h-10 w-auto object-contain drop-shadow-md"
              alt="TN7 Solutions Logo"
            />
            <span className="hidden md:inline text-xl font-bold text-gradient bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent tracking-tight">
              TN7 EDU
            </span>
          </a>
        </Link>

        {/* Mobile Menu Button */}
        <button
          className="md:hidden text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-700 focus:outline-none"
          onClick={() => setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen)}
          aria-label="Toggle Menu"
        >
          <svg
            className="w-7 h-7"
            fill="none"
            stroke="currentColor"
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
          >
            <path
              strokeLinecap="round"
              strokeLinejoin="round"
              strokeWidth="2"
              d={isMenuOpen ? 'M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12' : 'M4 6h16M4 12h16m-7 6h7'}
            />
          </svg>
        </button>

        {/* Menu */}
        <nav
          className={`${
            isMenuOpen ? 'block' : 'hidden'
          } md:flex md:items-center md:space-x-2 absolute md:static top-full left-0 right-0 bg-white/90 md:bg-transparent shadow-lg md:shadow-none border-t md:border-t-0 border-gray-100 md:border-none mt-2 md:mt-0 px-4 md:px-0 py-4 md:py-0`}
        >
          <ul className="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-2 md:gap-0 list-none">
            <li>
              <Link href="/" passHref>
                <a className="block py-2 px-4 text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 font-semibold transition duration-200 rounded-lg">
                  Trang chá»§
                </a>
              </Link>
            </li>
            <li>
              <GroupPageLink
                name="Giá»›i thiá»‡u"
                urls={[

mÃ u cá»§a backgroub hÃ²a vÃ o mÃ u cá»§a backgroub cá»§a ná»n Navbar import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react';

import Link from 'next/link';

import { IAppConfig } from '../utils/Content';

interface INavbarProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
}
interface ILink {
  name: string;
  url: string;
}

const ChevronDownIcon = ({ visible }: { visible: boolean }) => (
  <svg
    className={`ml-1 w-4 h-4 transition-transform duration-300 ${
      visible ? 'rotate-180' : ''
    }`}
    fill="none"
    stroke="currentColor"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
  >
    <path
      strokeLinecap="round"
      strokeLinejoin="round"
      strokeWidth="2"
      d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"
    />
  </svg>
);

function GroupPageLink({ name, urls }: { name: string; urls: Array<ILink> }) {
  const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false);
  const enterTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
  const leaveTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);

  const handleMouseEnter = () => {
    if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    enterTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(true), 80);
  };
  const handleMouseLeave = () => {
    if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
    leaveTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setVisible(false), 150);
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    return () => {
      if (enterTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(enterTimeoutRef.current);
      if (leaveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(leaveTimeoutRef.current);
    };
  }, []);

  return (
    <div
      className="relative flex flex-col items-center"
      onMouseEnter={handleMouseEnter}
      onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave}
    >
      <div className="py-2 px-3 flex items-center cursor-pointer select-none text-base font-semibold text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 transition duration-200">
        <span>{name}</span>
        <ChevronDownIcon visible={visible} />
      </div>
      <ul
        className={`absolute top-full left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 mt-2 min-w-[200px] bg-white rounded-xl shadow-2xl py-2 transition-all duration-300 origin-top ${
          visible
            ? 'opacity-100 scale-y-100 visible z-50'
            : 'opacity-0 scale-y-95 invisible'
        }`}
      >
        {urls.map((u) => (
          <li key={u.name}>
            <Link href={u.url} passHref>
              <a className="block px-5 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-blue-50 hover:text-blue-700 rounded-lg transition duration-200">
                {u.name}
              </a>
            </Link>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
}

const Navbar = (props: INavbarProps) => {
  const navbarRef = useRef<HTMLHeadElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleScroll = () => {
      if (!navbarRef.current) return;
      const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;
      const isScrolled = window.scrollY > 40;
      if (!isMobile) {
        if (isScrolled) {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add(
            'py-2',
            'shadow-md',
            'bg-white/40',
            'backdrop-blur-lg'
          );
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-5', 'shadow-xl', 'bg-white');
        } else {
          navbarRef.current.classList.add(
            'py-5',
            'shadow-xl',
            'bg-white/40',
            'backdrop-blur-lg'
          );
          navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2', 'shadow-md');
        }
      } else {
        navbarRef.current.classList.add(
          'py-4',
          'shadow-lg',
          'bg-white/40',
          'backdrop-blur-lg'
        );
        navbarRef.current.classList.remove('py-2', 'bg-white');
      }
    };
    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
    handleScroll();
    return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
  }, []);

  const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false);

  return (
    <header
      ref={navbarRef}
      className="fixed top-0 w-full z-50 transition-all duration-300 bg-white/40 backdrop-blur-lg shadow-xl py-5"
      style={{ fontFamily: 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif' }}
    >
      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 flex items-center justify-between">

        </Link>

        <button
          className="md:hidden text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-700 focus:outline-none"
          onClick={() => setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen)}
          aria-label="Toggle Menu"
        >
          <svg
            className="w-7 h-7"
            fill="none"
            stroke="currentColor"
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
          >
            <path
              strokeLinecap="round"
              strokeLinejoin="round"
              strokeWidth="2"
              d={isMenuOpen ? 'M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12' : 'M4 6h16M4 12h16m-7 6h7'}
            />
          </svg>
        </button>

        {/* Menu */}
        <nav
          className={`${
            isMenuOpen ? 'block' : 'hidden'
          } md:flex md:items-center md:space-x-2 absolute md:static top-full left-0 right-0 bg-white/90 md:bg-transparent shadow-lg md:shadow-none mt-2 md:mt-0 px-4 md:px-0 py-4 md:py-0`}

_**User (2025-09-28 04:19Z)**_

kiá»ƒm tra vÃ  kháº¯c phá»¥c import { SignJWT } from 'jose';
import type { NextApiRequest, NextApiResponse } from 'next';

import { getJwtSecretKey } from '../../admin/auth';

export default async function handler(
  req: NextApiRequest,
  res: NextApiResponse
) {
  const { username, password } = JSON.parse(req.body);
  try {
    if (req.method === 'POST') {
      await new Promise<void>((resolve) => {
        setTimeout(() => {
          resolve();
        }, 3000);
      });
      if (username === 'admin' && password === process.env.ADMIN_PASSWORD) {
        console.log('ENV:', process.env.ADMIN_PASSWORD, 'INPUT:', password);
        const token = await new SignJWT({
          username,
        })
          .setProtectedHeader({ alg: 'HS256' })
          .setIssuedAt()
          .setExpirationTime('4h')
          .sign(getJwtSecretKey());

        // const response = NextResponse.json(
        //   { success: true },
        //   { status: 200, headers: { "content-type": "application/json" } }
        // );
        // response.cookies.set("token",token)
        res.status(200).json({ success: true, token });
      } else res.status(500).send({ error: 'Incorrect' });
    } else res.status(500).send({ error: 'Unsuported method' });
  } catch (err) {
    res.status(500).send({ error: 'Failed to fetch data' });
  }
}

_**Assistant (copilot/gpt-4.1)**_

````tsx
import { SignJWT } from 'jose';
import type { NextApiRequest, NextApiResponse } from 'next';
import { getJwtSecretKey } from '../../admin/auth';

export default async function handler(
  req: NextApiRequest,
  res: NextApiResponse
) {
  if (req.method !== 'POST') {
    return res.status(405).json({ error: 'Unsupported method' });
  }

  try {
    const { username, password } = JSON.parse(req.body);

    // Debug: kiá»ƒm tra giÃ¡ trá»‹ biáº¿n mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng vÃ  input
   .log('ENV:', process.env.ADMIN_PASSWORD, 'INPUT:', password);

    // Äá»£i 3 giÃ¢y (mÃ´ phá»ng xá»­ lÃ½)
    await new Promise<void>((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, 3000));

    if (username === 'admin' && password === process.env.ADMIN_PASSWORD) {
      const token = await new SignJWT({ username })
        .setProtectedHeader({ alg: 'HS256' })
        .setIssuedAt()
        .setExpirationTime('4h')
        .sign(getJwtSecretKey());

      return res.status(200).json({ success: true, token });
    } else {
      return res.status(401).json({ error: 'Incorrect username or password' });
    }
  } catch (err) {
    console.error('Login error:', err);
    return res.status(500).json({ error: 'Failed to fetch data' });
  }
}
````

**Kháº¯c phá»¥c & cáº£i tiáº¿n:**
- Äá»•i status lá»—i tá»« `500` sang `401` khi sai máº­t kháº©u/username.
- Äá»•i status lá»—i tá»« `500` sang `405` khi sai method.
- ThÃªm log lá»—i chi tiáº¿t.
- Sá»­ dá»¥ng `return` Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh cháº¡y tiáº¿p code sau khi tráº£ vá» response.
- Äáº£m báº£o API tráº£ vá» Ä‘Ãºng chuáº©n HTTP cho client dá»… xá»­ lÃ½.

**Sau khi sá»­a:**  
- Náº¿u nháº­p Ä‘Ãºng, tráº£ vá» `{ success: true, token }`.
- Náº¿u sai, tráº£ vá» `{ error: 'Incorrect username or password' }` vá»›i status `401`.
- Náº¿u sai method, tráº£ vá» `{ error: 'Unsupported method' }` vá»›i status `405`.

**Lá»—i:**

**CÃ¡ch sá»­a:**

**VÃ­ dá»¥ sá»­a Ä‘Ãºng:**
````tsx

  <a className={...}>
    <svg>...</svg>
    <span className="mx-4 font-medium">Dashboard</span>
  </a>
</Link>
````

**TÃ³m láº¡i:**


**Giáº£i thÃ­ch:**  
- Thay vÃ¬ truyá»n nhiá»u children trá»±c tiáº¿p vÃ o `<Link>`, hÃ£y dÃ¹ng `<Link href="..." passHref><a>...</a></Link>`.
- Äáº·t toÃ n bá»™ ná»™i dung (icon, text...) bÃªn trong tháº» `<a>`.
- Sá»­a láº¡i cho táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c menu item trong sidebar.

**LÆ°u Ã½:**  
- Náº¿u dÃ¹ng Next.js 13+ vá»›i App Router, báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ dÃ¹ng `<Link>` vá»›i nhiá»u children, nhÆ°ng vá»›i Pages Router (hoáº·c Next.js 12), pháº£i dÃ¹ng Ä‘Ãºng nhÆ° trÃªn.

_**Assistant (copilot/gpt-4.1)**_

**Lá»—i:**  
`TypeError: undefined is not iterable (cannot read property Symbol(Symbol.iterator))`  
Xuáº¥t hiá»‡n á»Ÿ dÃ²ng:  
```js
setBookings([...body.data]);
```
**NguyÃªn nhÃ¢n:**  
`body.data` bá»‹ `undefined`, nÃªn khÃ´ng thá»ƒ dÃ¹ng toÃ¡n tá»­ spread (`...`) vá»›i nÃ³.

---

**CÃ¡ch kháº¯c phá»¥c:**  
Kiá»ƒm tra API tráº£ vá», Ä‘áº£m báº£o `body.data` luÃ´n lÃ  má»™t máº£ng.  
Sá»­a láº¡i Ä‘oáº¡n code nhÆ° sau:

````tsx
// ...existing code...
useEffect(() => {
  (async () => {
    const response = await fetch('/api/booking/get-all', {
      method: 'GET',
    });
    const body = await response.json();
    setBookings(Array.isArray(body.data) ? [...body.data] : []);
    // console.log(body.data);
  })();
}, []);
// ...existing code...
````

**Giáº£i thÃ­ch:**  
- DÃ¹ng `Array.isArray(body.data) ? [...body.data] : []` Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh lá»—i khi `body.data` khÃ´ng pháº£i lÃ  máº£ng hoáº·c bá»‹ undefined.
- Náº¿u API tráº£ vá» sai, báº¡n cáº§n kiá»ƒm tra láº¡i API `/api/booking/get-all` Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘áº£m báº£o luÃ´n tráº£ vá» `{ data: [...] }`.

---

**TÃ³m láº¡i:**  
- Lá»—i do API tráº£ vá» `data` khÃ´ng pháº£i máº£ng hoáº·c bá»‹ undefined.
- Sá»­a nhÆ° trÃªn Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh lá»—i vÃ  hiá»ƒn thá»‹ dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘Ãºng.

import { GetServerSideProps } from 'next';

interface IPartnershipProps {
  config: IAppConfig;

interface ISubmitStatus {
  code: number;
  content?: { [key: string]: string };
}

function isValidEmail(email: string): boolean {
  const regex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  return regex.test(email);
}

const Partnership = (props: IPartnershipProps) => {
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState<ISubmitStatus>({ code: 0 });

  useEffect(() => {
    setLoading(false);
  }, [submitStatus]);

  const partnershipSubmit = async (event: FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
    event.preventDefault();
    setLoading(true);

    try {
      const formData = new FormData(event.currentTarget);
      const formDict: { [id: string]: string } = {};
      formData.forEach((value, key) => {
        formDict[key] = value as string;
      });

      const checkDict: { [id: string]: any } = {};
      if (!formDict.company || formDict.company.length < 3) {
        checkDict.company = 'Company name is invalid (>=3 characters)';
      }
      if (!formDict.subject || formDict.subject.length < 5) {
        checkDict.subject = 'Partnership topic is invalid (>=5 characters)';
      }
      if (!formDict.email || !isValidEmail(formDict.email)) {
        checkDict.email = 'Email address format is incorrect';
      }
      if (!formDict.contact || formDict.contact.length < 2) {
        checkDict.contact = 'Contact person name is required';
      }
      if (!formDict.phone || formDict.phone.length < 10) {
        checkDict.phone = 'Valid phone number is required';
      }

      if (Object.keys(checkDict).length > 0) {
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 0, content: checkDict });
        return;
      }

      const response = await fetch('/api/partnership-register', {
        method: 'POST',
        body: JSON.stringify(formDict),
      });

      if (!response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 0, content: data });
      } else {
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 1 });
      }
    } catch (error) {
      setSubmitStatus({ code: -1 });
    }
  };

                        className="form-input w-full resize-none border-2 border-gray-200 bg-white py-3 px-4 text-gray-700 outline-none focus:border-blue-500 focus:shadow-lg"
                      ></textarea>
                    </div>

                    <div className="flex justify-center">
                      <button
                        type="submit"
                        className="btn-primary px-12 py-4 text-lg font-semibold text-white rounded-full outline-none flex gap-3 items-center justify-center min-w-[200px]"
                        disabled={loading}
                      >
                        {loading ? (
                          <>
                            <div className="h-5 w-5 border-t-transparent border-solid animate-spin rounded-full border-white border-2"></div>
                            Sending...
                          </>
                        ) : (
                          <>
                            Book a Call
                            <svg
                              className="w-5 h-5"

                              />
                            </svg>
                          </>
                        )}
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </form>
                ) : (
                  <div className="flex flex-col items-center gap-6 py-8">
                    {submitStatus.code === 1 ? (
                      <div className="text-center success-animation">
                        <div className="w-20 h-20 bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 to-green-600 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-6 mx-auto">
                          <svg
                            className="w-10 h-10 text-white"
                            fill="currentColor"
                            viewBox="0 0 20 20"
                          >
                            <path
                              fillRule="evenodd"
                              d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z"
                              clipRule="evenodd"
                            />
                          </svg>
                        </div>
                        <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                          Partnership Request Sent Successfully!
                        </h3>
                        <blockquote className="max-w-lg text-gray-700 italic text-center leading-relaxed">
                          &quot;TN7 Solutions sincerely thanks you for your
                          interest, we will contact you soon!&quot;
                        </blockquote>
                      </div>
                    ) : (
                      <div className="text-center">
                        <div className="w-20 h-20 bg-gradient-to-r from-red-400 to-red-600 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-6 mx-auto">
                          <svg
                            className="w-10 h-10 text-white"
                            fill="currentColor"
                            viewBox="0 0 20 20"
                          >
                            <path
                              fillRule="evenodd"
                              d="M4.293 4.293a1 1 0 011.414 0L10 8.586l4.293-4.293a1 1 0 111.414 1.414L11.414 10l4.293 4.293a1 1 0 01-1.414 1.414L10 11.414l-4.293 4.293a1 1 0 01-1.414-1.414L8.586 10 4.293 5.707a1 1 0 010-1.414z"
                              clipRule="evenodd"
                            />
                          </svg>
                        </div>
                        <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                          Processing Error
                        </h3>
                        <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                          There was an error processing your request. Please try
                          again!
                        </p>
                        <button
                          onClick={() => setSubmitStatus({ code: 0 })}

                          Try Again
                        </button>
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>

              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Office Location & Contact Info */}

  IPartnershipProps
> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  return {

};

````tsx
import React, { FormEvent, useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { GetServerSideProps } from 'next';
import { Meta } from '../layout/Meta';
import { Main } from '../templates/Main';
import { IAppConfig, getDataConfig } from '../utils/Content';

interface IPartnershipProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
}
interface ISubmitStatus {
  code: number;
  content?: { [key: string]: string };
}

function isValidEmail(email: string): boolean {
  const regex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  return regex.test(email);
}

const Partnership = (props: IPartnershipProps) => {
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState<ISubmitStatus>({ code: 0 });

  useEffect(() => {
    setLoading(false);
  }, [submitStatus]);

  const partnershipSubmit = async (event: FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
    event.preventDefault();
    setLoading(true);

    try {
      const formData = new FormData(event.currentTarget);
      const formDict: { [id: string]: string } = {};
      formData.forEach((value, key) => {
        formDict[key] = value as string;
      });

      const checkDict: { [id: string]: any } = {};
      if (!formDict.company || formDict.company.length < 3) {
        checkDict.company = 'TÃªn cÃ´ng ty pháº£i cÃ³ Ã­t nháº¥t 3 kÃ½ tá»±';
      }
      if (!formDict.subject || formDict.subject.length < 5) {
        checkDict.subject = 'Chá»§ Ä‘á» há»£p tÃ¡c pháº£i cÃ³ Ã­t nháº¥t 5 kÃ½ tá»±';
      }
      if (!formDict.email || !isValidEmail(formDict.email)) {
        checkDict.email = 'Äá»‹a chá»‰ email khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡';
      }
      if (!formDict.contact || formDict.contact.length < 2) {
        checkDict.contact = 'TÃªn ngÆ°á»i liÃªn há»‡ pháº£i cÃ³ Ã­t nháº¥t 2 kÃ½ tá»±';
      }
      if (!formDict.phone || formDict.phone.length < 10) {
        checkDict.phone = 'Sá»‘ Ä‘iá»‡n thoáº¡i há»£p lá»‡ lÃ  báº¯t buá»™c';
      }

      if (Object.keys(checkDict).length > 0) {
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 0, content: checkDict });
        return;
      }

      const response = await fetch('/api/partnership-register', {
        method: 'POST',
        body: JSON.stringify(formDict),
      });

      if (!response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 0, content: data });
      } else {
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 1 });
      }
    } catch (error) {
      setSubmitStatus({ code: -1 });
````

function isValidEmail(email: string): boolean {
  const regex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  return regex.test(email);
}

_**Assistant (copilot/gpt-4.1)**_

````tsx
import React, { FormEvent, useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { GetServerSideProps } from 'next';
import { Meta } from '../layout/Meta';
import { Main } from '../templates/Main';
import { IAppConfig, getDataConfig } from '../utils/Content';

interface IPartnershipProps {
  config: IAppConfig;
}
interface ISubmitStatus {
  code: number;
  content?: { [key: string]: string };
}

function isValidEmail(email: string): boolean {
  const regex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  return regex.test(email);
}

const Partnership = (props: IPartnershipProps) => {
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState<ISubmitStatus>({ code: 0 });

  useEffect(() => {
    setLoading(false);
  }, [submitStatus]);

  const partnershipSubmit = async (event: FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
    event.preventDefault();
    setLoading(true);

    try {
      const formData = new FormData(event.currentTarget);
      const formDict: { [id: string]: string } = {};
      formData.forEach((value, key) => {
        formDict[key] = value as string;
      });

      const checkDict: { [id: string]: any } = {};
      if (!formDict.company || formDict.company.length < 3) {
        checkDict.company = 'TÃªn cÃ´ng ty pháº£i cÃ³ Ã­t nháº¥t 3 kÃ½ tá»±';
      }
      if (!formDict.subject || formDict.subject.length < 5) {
        checkDict.subject = 'Chá»§ Ä‘á» há»£p tÃ¡c pháº£i cÃ³ Ã­t nháº¥t 5 kÃ½ tá»±';
      }
      if (!formDict.email || !isValidEmail(formDict.email)) {
        checkDict.email = 'Äá»‹a chá»‰ email khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡';
      }
      if (!formDict.contact || formDict.contact.length < 2) {
        checkDict.contact = 'TÃªn ngÆ°á»i liÃªn há»‡ pháº£i cÃ³ Ã­t nháº¥t 2 kÃ½ tá»±';
      }
      if (!formDict.phone || formDict.phone.length < 10) {
        checkDict.phone = 'Sá»‘ Ä‘iá»‡n thoáº¡i há»£p lá»‡ lÃ  báº¯t buá»™c';
      }

      if (Object.keys(checkDict).length > 0) {
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 0, content: checkDict });
        return;
      }

      const response = await fetch('/api/partnership-register', {
        method: 'POST',
        body: JSON.stringify(formDict),
      });

      if (!response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 0, content: data });
      } else {
        setSubmitStatus({ code: 1 });
      }
    } catch (error) {
      setSubmitStatus({ code: -1 });
    }
  };

  return (
    <Main
      config={props.config}
      meta={
        <Meta
          title="TN7 EDU"
          description="Há»£p tÃ¡c cÃ¹ng TN7 EDU Ä‘á»ƒ má»Ÿ rá»™ng káº¿t ná»‘i, phÃ¡t triá»ƒn bá»n vá»¯ng vÃ  táº¡o giÃ¡ trá»‹ lÃ¢u dÃ i thÃ´ng qua há»£p tÃ¡c chiáº¿n lÆ°á»£c."
          config={props.config}
        />
      }
    >
      <style jsx global>{`
        .gradient-text {
          background: linear-gradient(90deg, #06b6d4 0%, #6366f1 50%, #f472b6 100%);
          -webkit-background-clip: text;
          -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
          background-clip: text;
        }
        .glass-effect {
          background: rgba(245, 245, 255, 0.85);
          backdrop-filter: blur(16px);
          border: 1px solid rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.12);
          box-shadow: 0 8px 32px 0 rgba(99,102,241,0.08);
        }
        .form-input {
          transition: box-shadow 0.3s, border-color 0.3s;
          border-radius: 12px;
          border: 1.5px solid #e0e7ff;
          background: #f8fafc;
        }
````

````tsx
// Animation hook
const useScrollAnimation = () => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => entries.forEach((entry) => entry.isIntersecting && setIsVisible(true)),
      { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '50px' }
    );
    if (ref.current) observer.observe(ref.current);
    return () => observer.disconnect();
  }, []);
  return [ref, isVisible] as const;
};

    </Main>
  );
};

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  const posts = config.blogs.slugs
    .map((slug) =>
      getPostBySlug({ slug }, ['slug', 'title', 'description', 'date', 'image'])
    )
    .filter((p) => p !== null);
  return {
    props: {
      config,
      blogs: posts,
    },
  };
};

export default Home;
````

// Animation hook
const useScrollAnimation = () => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) =>
        entries.forEach((entry) => entry.isIntersecting && setIsVisible(true)),
      { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '50px' }
    );
    if (ref.current) observer.observe(ref.current);
    return () => observer.disconnect();
  }, []);
  return [ref, isVisible] as const;
};

                {openFaq === idx && (
                  <div className="px-6 pb-6">
                    <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                      {faq.answer}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
      {/* FAQ HR */}
      <section
        ref={faqHRRef}
        className={`py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-purple-50 transition-all duration-1000 ${
          faqHRVisible ? 'animate-fade-in-up' : 'opacity-0 translate-y-12'
        }`}
      >
        <div className="max-w-3xl mx-auto px-4">
          <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-center text-gray-900 mb-12">
            FAQ â€“ DÃ nh cho Doanh nghiá»‡p/HR
          </h2>
          <div className="space-y-6">
            {faqsHR.map((faq, idx) => (
              <div
                key={idx}
                className="bg-gray-50 rounded-xl overflow-hidden card-hover"
              >
                <button
                  className="w-full text-left p-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:bg-gray-100 flex justify-between items-center"
                  onClick={() => setOpenFaqHR(openFaqHR === idx ? null : idx)}
                >
                  <span className="text-lg">{faq.question}</span>
                  <span
                    className={`transform transition-transform duration-300 ${
                      openFaqHR === idx ? 'rotate-180' : ''
                    }`}
                  >
                    â–¼
                  </span>
                </button>
                {openFaqHR === idx && (
                  <div className="px-6 pb-6">
                    <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                      {faq.answer}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Callout */}
      <section className="py-12 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-700 text-white text-center">
        <div className="max-w-2xl mx-auto px-4">
          <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-4">
            â€œMá»—i hÃ nh trÃ¬nh lÃ  khÃ¡c biá»‡t, nhÆ°ng sá»± Ä‘á»“ng hÃ nh táº­n tÃ¢m tá»« TN7 EDU
            luÃ´n nháº¥t quÃ¡n.â€
          </h3>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* CTA cuá»‘i trang */}
      <section className="py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-600 to-purple-700">
        <div className="max-w-3xl mx-auto px-4 text-center">
          <h2 className="text-4xl font-bold text-white mb-6">
            KhÃ¡m phÃ¡ lá»™ trÃ¬nh tiáº¿ng Anh vÃ  cÆ¡ há»™i nghá» nghiá»‡p/Ä‘á»‹nh cÆ°
          </h2>

            ÄÄƒng kÃ½ nháº­n tÆ° váº¥n miá»…n phÃ­ ngay hÃ´m nay.
          </p>
          <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
            <Link href="#booking">
              <span className="bg-white text-blue-600 px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer">
                ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÆ° váº¥n miá»…n phÃ­
              </span>

                Giáº£i phÃ¡p doanh nghiá»‡p
              </span>
            </Link>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      <section id="booking">
        <Booking />
      </section>

      {/* Blog */}
      <section className="py-12 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4">
          <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-center text-gray-900 mb-8">
            BÃ i viáº¿t má»›i
          </h2>
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {props.blogs.slice(0, 3).map((blog, idx) => (
              <Link key={idx} href={`/blog/${blog.slug}`}>
                <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-gray-50 rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6 card-hover cursor-pointer flex flex-col">
                  <img
                    src={blog.image}
                    alt={blog.title}
                    className="h-32 w-full object-cover rounded-xl mb-4"
                  />
                  <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                    {blog.title}
                  </h3>
                  <p className="text-gray-600 mb-2">{blog.description}</p>
                  <span className="text-blue-600 font-semibold mt-auto">
                    Äá»c bÃ i viáº¿t â†’
                  </span>
                </div>
              </Link>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </Main>
  );
};

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  const posts = config.blogs.slugs
    .map((slug) =>
      getPostBySlug({ slug }, ['slug', 'title', 'description', 'date', 'image'])
    )
    .filter((p) => p !== null);
  return {
    props: {
      config,
      blogs: posts,
    },
  };
};

export default Home;

````tsx
// Animation hook
const useScrollAnimation = () => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  const ref = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) =>
        entries.forEach((entry) => entry.isIntersecting && setIsVisible(true)),
      { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '50px' }
    );
    if (ref.current) observer.observe(ref.current);
    return () => observer.disconnect();
  }, []);
  return [ref, isVisible] as const;
};

            KhÃ¡m phÃ¡ lá»™ trÃ¬nh tiáº¿ng Anh vÃ  cÆ¡ há»™i nghá» nghiá»‡p/Ä‘á»‹nh cÆ°
          </h2>
          <p className="text-xl text-blue-100 mb-12">
            ÄÄƒng kÃ½ nháº­n tÆ° váº¥n miá»…n phÃ­ ngay hÃ´m nay.
          </p>
          <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
            <Link href="#booking">
              <span className="bg-white text-blue-600 px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer">
                ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÆ° váº¥n miá»…n phÃ­
              </span>
            </Link>
            <Link href="#business-form">
              <span className="border-2 border-white text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-600 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer">
                Giáº£i phÃ¡p doanh nghiá»‡p
              </span>
            </Link>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Booking Component */}
      <section id="booking">
        <Booking />
      </section>

      {/* Blog */}
      <section className="py-12 bg-white">
        <div className="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4">
          <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-center text-gray-900 mb-8">
            BÃ i viáº¿t má»›i
          </h2>
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {props.blogs.slice(0, 3).map((blog, idx) => (
              <Link key={idx} href={`/blog/${blog.slug}`}>
                <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-gray-50 rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6 card-hover cursor-pointer flex flex-col">
                  <img
                    src={blog.image}
                    alt={blog.title}
                    className="h-32 w-full object-cover rounded-xl mb-4"
                  />
                  <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
                    {blog.title}
                  </h3>
                  <p className="text-gray-600 mb-2">{blog.description}</p>
                  <span className="text-blue-600 font-semibold mt-auto">
                    Äá»c bÃ i viáº¿t â†’
                  </span>
                </div>
              </Link>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </Main>
  );
};

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  const posts = config.blogs.slugs
    .map((slug) =>
      getPostBySlug({ slug }, ['slug', 'title', 'description', 'date', 'image'])
    )
    .filter((p) => p !== null);
  return {
    props: {
      config,
      blogs: posts,
    },
  };
};

export default Home;
// ...existing code...
````

````tsx
                .map((faq, idx) => (
                  <FadeIn key={faq.question} delay={0.1 + idx * 0.1}>
                    <div className="bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden card-hover">
                      <button
                        className="w-full text-left p-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:bg-gray-100 flex justify-between items-center"
                        onClick={() => setOpenFaq(openFaq === idx ? null : idx)}
                      >
                        <span className="text-lg">{faq.question}</span>
                        <span
                          className={`transform transition-transform duration-300 ${
                            openFaq === idx ? 'rotate-180' : ''
                          }`}
                        >
                          â–¼
                        </span>
                      </button>
                      {openFaq === idx && (
                        <div className="px-6 pb-6">
                          <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                            {faq.answer}
                          </p>
                        </div>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </FadeIn>
                ))}
            </div>
            <div className="mt-8 text-center">
              <Link href="#booking">
                <span className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-600 text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer">
                  ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÆ° váº¥n ngay hÃ´m nay Ä‘á»ƒ nháº­n lá»™ trÃ¬nh cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n hÃ³a miá»…n phÃ­
                </span>
              </Link>
            </div>
          </div>
        </FadeIn>
      </section>

      {/* Booking CTA */}
      <section id="booking" className="py-16 bg-white text-center">
        <FadeIn>
          <div className="max-w-xl mx-auto px-4">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-700 mb-4">
              Äáº·t lá»‹ch tÆ° váº¥n 1:1 miá»…n phÃ­ cÃ¹ng chuyÃªn gia TN7 EDU
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-700 mb-6">
              Nháº­n lá»™ trÃ¬nh cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n hÃ³a, giáº£i phÃ¡p doanh nghiá»‡p vÃ  cÆ¡ há»™i káº¿t ná»‘i HR toÃ n cáº§u.
            </p>
            <Link href="/#booking">
              <span className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-600 text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer">
                Äáº·t lá»‹ch tÆ° váº¥n miá»…n phÃ­
              </span>
            </Link>
          </div>
        </FadeIn>
      </section>
    </Main>
  );
};

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  return {
    props: {
      config,
    },
  };
};

export default AboutUs;
````

  children,
  delay = 0,
}: {
  children: React.ReactNode;
  delay?: number;
}) => (
  <div
    style={{
      animation: `fadeIn 0.8s ease ${delay}s both`,

      }

_**Assistant (copilot/gpt-4.1)**_

Báº¡n Ä‘Ã£ viáº¿t Ä‘Ãºng cáº¥u trÃºc React vÃ  Next.js, nhÆ°ng náº¿u giao diá»‡n váº«n trá»‘ng, hÃ£y kiá»ƒm tra cÃ¡c nguyÃªn nhÃ¢n sau:

### 1. **Kiá»ƒm tra Tailwind CSS**
- Äáº£m báº£o Ä‘Ã£ cÃ i Ä‘áº·t vÃ  import Tailwind vÃ o dá»± Ã¡n.
- Trong `_app.tsx` pháº£i cÃ³:
````tsx
import '../styles/globals.css';
````
- File `globals.css` pháº£i import Tailwind:
````css
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;
````

### 2. **Kiá»ƒm tra lá»—i runtime**
- Má»Ÿ DevTools (F12) â†’ Tab Console, xem cÃ³ lá»—i JavaScript khÃ´ng.
- Náº¿u cÃ³ lá»—i liÃªn quan Ä‘áº¿n CSS hoáº·c import, cáº§n sá»­a trÆ°á»›c.

### 3. **Kiá»ƒm tra props truyá»n vÃ o Main**
- Náº¿u `props.config` bá»‹ lá»—i hoáº·c undefined, component cÃ³ thá»ƒ khÃ´ng render.
- Thá»­ thay `config={props.config}` báº±ng má»™t object táº¡m thá»i Ä‘á»ƒ test.

### 4. **Kiá»ƒm tra layout vÃ  export**
- Äáº£m báº£o file náº±m trong thÆ° má»¥c `pages` vÃ  export máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh Ä‘Ãºng:
````tsx
export default AboutUs;
````

### 5. **Kiá»ƒm tra hiá»‡u á»©ng FadeIn**
- Hiá»‡u á»©ng FadeIn dÃ¹ng CSS animation, nhÆ°ng class `.fade-in` máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh `opacity: 0`. Náº¿u animation khÃ´ng cháº¡y, ná»™i dung sáº½ bá»‹ áº©n.
- Thá»­ sá»­a láº¡i CSS nhÆ° sau Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘áº£m báº£o animation cháº¡y:
````tsx
// ...trong FadeIn...
<style jsx>{`
  @keyframes fadeIn {
    from {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(30px);
    }
    to {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: none;
    }
  }
  .fade-in {
    opacity: 1; /* Sá»­a láº¡i máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  1 */
    animation-fill-mode: both;
    animation-name: fadeIn;
  }
`}</style>
````

### 6. **Kiá»ƒm tra hÃ¬nh áº£nh**
- Náº¿u hÃ¬nh áº£nh khÃ´ng load, thá»­ thay báº±ng link áº£nh khÃ¡c hoáº·c kiá»ƒm tra máº¡ng.

---

**Náº¿u sau khi kiá»ƒm tra váº«n khÃ´ng hiá»‡n, hÃ£y thá»­ xÃ³a hiá»‡u á»©ng FadeIn Ä‘á»ƒ test:**
````tsx
// Thay FadeIn báº±ng <div> bÃ¬nh thÆ°á»ng Ä‘á»ƒ kiá»ƒm tra
<div>{children}</div>
````

Náº¿u ná»™i dung xuáº¥t hiá»‡n, lá»—i náº±m á»Ÿ CSS animation. Náº¿u váº«n khÃ´ng xuáº¥t hiá»‡n, hÃ£y kiá»ƒm tra láº¡i cáº¥u hÃ¬nh Next.js/Tailwind hoáº·c gá»­i lá»—i console Ä‘á»ƒ mÃ¬nh há»— trá»£ chi tiáº¿t hÆ¡n.

````tsx
const FadeIn = ({
  children,
  delay = 0,
}: {
  children: React.ReactNode;
  delay?: number;
}) => (
  <div
    style={{
      animation: `fadeIn 0.8s ease ${delay}s both`,
      opacity: 1, // Äáº£m báº£o máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  hiá»‡n
    }}

    {children}

      @keyframes fadeIn {
        from {
          opacity: 0;
          transform: translateY(30px);
        }
        to {
          opacity: 1;
          transform: none;
        }
      }
      .fade-in {
        animation-fill-mode: both;
        animation-name: fadeIn;
      }
    `}</style>

              {faqs
                .filter((f) => f.type === faqType)
                .map((faq, idx) => (
                  <FadeIn key={faq.question} delay={0.1 + idx * 0.1}>
                    <div className="bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden card-hover">
                      <button
                        className="w-full text-left p-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:bg-gray-100 flex justify-between items-center"
                        onClick={() => setOpenFaq(openFaq === idx ? null : idx)}
                      >
                        <span className="text-lg">{faq.question}</span>
                        <span
                          className={`transform transition-transform duration-300 ${
                            openFaq === idx ? 'rotate-180' : ''
                          }`}
                        >
                          â–¼
                        </span>
                      </button>
                      {openFaq === idx && (
                        <div className="px-6 pb-6">
                          <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                            {faq.answer}
                          </p>
                        </div>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </FadeIn>
                ))}
            </div>
            <div className="mt-8 text-center">
              <Link href="#booking">
                <span className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-600 text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer">
                  ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÆ° váº¥n ngay hÃ´m nay Ä‘á»ƒ nháº­n lá»™ trÃ¬nh cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n hÃ³a miá»…n phÃ­
                </span>
              </Link>
            </div>
          </div>
        </FadeIn>
      </section>

      {/* Booking CTA */}
      <section id="booking" className="py-16 bg-white text-center">
        <FadeIn>
          <div className="max-w-xl mx-auto px-4">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-700 mb-4">
              Äáº·t lá»‹ch tÆ° váº¥n 1:1 miá»…n phÃ­ cÃ¹ng chuyÃªn gia TN7 EDU
            </h2>
            <p className="text-lg text-gray-700 mb-6">
              Nháº­n lá»™ trÃ¬nh cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n hÃ³a, giáº£i phÃ¡p doanh nghiá»‡p vÃ  cÆ¡ há»™i káº¿t ná»‘i HR toÃ n cáº§u.
            </p>
            <Link href="/#booking">
              <span className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-600 text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-semibold text-lg shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer">
                Äáº·t lá»‹ch tÆ° váº¥n miá»…n phÃ­
              </span>
            </Link>
          </div>
        </FadeIn>
      </section>
    </Main>
  );
};

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps<IhomeProps> = async () => {
  const config = getDataConfig();
  return {
    props: {
      config,
    },
  };
};

export default AboutUs;
````

const FadeIn = ({
  children,
  delay = 0,
}: {
  children: React.ReactNode;
  delay?: number;
}) => (
  <div
    style={{
      animation: `fadeIn 0.8s ease ${delay}s both`,
      opacity: 1, // Äáº£m báº£o máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  hiá»‡n
    }}
    className="fade-in"
  >
    {children}
    <style jsx>{`
      @keyframes fadeIn {
        from {
          opacity: 0;
          transform: translateY(30px);
        }
        to {
          opacity: 1;
          transform: none;
        }
      }
      .fade-in {
        animation-fill-mode: both;
        animation-name: fadeIn;
      }
    `}</style>

);

                  ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÆ° váº¥n ngay hÃ´m nay Ä‘á»ƒ nháº­n lá»™ trÃ¬nh cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n hÃ³a miá»…n

};
